divs: Sighting Detailsi was just looking randomly in the sky and there it was ,the craft hovered for 5 min then slowly moved away i could look at it with the binoculars and it looked like a sphere, weird was that on the sunlit side of the craft it was dark color ... it moved slowly away and ascended at the same time ... gone
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Windsor
There were no other sightings in Windsor on or around August 18th 2012
Summary: ufo hovered then slowly moved away i could look at it with the binoculars and it looked like a sphere
